The '''Dilapidated Old House''' is an event [[Domain]] encountered during the [[Bantan Sango Case Files: The Warrior Dog]] event.

It is marked under the [[File:Icon Dilapidated Old House.svg|25x25px]] map icon.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hp_ratio  = 15
|hp_type   = 2
|atk_ratio = 5
}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
''Attack names are unofficial except for Canine Art: Geo Bunshin and Canine Art: Plummeting Blade.''

{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Kageroumaru

|name_1 = Slash
|desc_1 = When in melee range, charges and slashes once with its sword, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2 = Slash Combo
|desc_2 = Performs consecutive slashes with its sword.
* '''Combo 1:''' Performs a horizontal and upwards slash at the player, before performing a flurry of slashes around itself, dealing '''50% ATK''', '''50% ATK''', '''35% ATK ×4''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Combo 2:''' Charges at the player while continuously slashing, before performing a spinning slash, dealing '''50% ATK''', '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_2 = Kageroumaru Slash Combo 1
|caption_2 = Slash Combo 1
|file_2_2 = Kageroumaru Slash Combo 2
|caption_2_2 = Slash Combo 2

|name_3 = Canine Art: Plummeting Blade
|desc_3 = Teleports to the player's location and marks an area around it, calling down thunder and dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} in the marked area shortly after.
|file_3 = Kageroumaru Thundercaller

|name_4 = Canine Art: Geo Bunshin
|desc_4 = Teleports away and leaves a {{Color|Geo}} Bunshin Bomb at its original location that marks an area around it before detonating, dealing '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}} in the marked area. This attack is also used to recover from the stunned state.
|file_4 = Kageroumaru Decoy Bomb Thunderwheels

|name_5 = Thunderwheels
|desc_5 = Launches three spinning wheels in different directions, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on hit. This attack is only used as a follow-up to '''Canine Art: Geo Bunshin'''.
|file_5 = Kageroumaru Decoy Bomb Thunderwheels

|name_6 = Thunderblades
|desc_6 = Launches three vertical blades at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on hit.

|name_7 = Stunned
|desc_7 = Upon receiving a certain amount of [[poise damage]], Kageroumaru will be stunned for a long period of time.
}}
